Gunmen travelling in a car opened fire early on Tuesday on a group of Egyptian policemen near Cairo 's Al - Azhar university , killing three and wounding nine others , the interior ministry said .
The attack comes just days ahead of a presidential election on May 26-27 , which former army chief Abdel Fattah al - Sisi is expected to win .
